survey_name: Online Freelance Platform User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online freelance platforms to assess their satisfaction, identify pain points, and understand their needs better.

questions.question_text: Which online freelance platform do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu for better mobile usability. 'Other' option should include a text field for specification.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with 'Other' as an open-ended option.

script.question_text: Which online freelance platform do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the platform's user interface and ease of navigation?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the scale is consistent throughout the survey.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the platform's user interface and ease of navigation?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the platform do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include 'Other' with an open-ended option for additional input.

script.question_text: What aspects of the platform do you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with payment processing on the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale for consistency. This question is critical for identifying financial pain points.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with payment processing on the platform?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the platform's customer support?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Keep the text box large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the platform's customer support?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this freelance platform to others?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question. Use a single-choice scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this freelance platform to others?

questions.question_text: What type of freelance work do you primarily seek or offer on the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu or checkboxes if multiple selections are allowed. Include 'Other' for unspecified categories.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with 'Other' as an open-ended option.

script.question_text: What type of freelance work do you primarily seek or offer on the platform?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the platform's fees and commission structure?
questions.client_notes: This question helps assess financial satisfaction. Use a Likert scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How would you rate the platform's fees and commission structure?

questions.question_text: What features would you like to see added to the platform in the future?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovative ideas. Ensure the response field is large enough.

script.question_text: What features would you like to see added to the platform in the future?

questions.question_text: How important is the platform's dispute resolution process to your overall satisfaction?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure importance. This helps prioritize platform improvements.

script.question_text: How important is the platform's dispute resolution process to your overall satisfaction?
